alert.note: Alert for Bayfield; Douglas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 17 at 8:05PM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...MODERATE TO HEAVY SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT SOUTHERN ST. LOUIS... NORTHEASTERN CARLTON...SOUTHWESTERN LAKE...NORTHERN BAYFIELD AND NORTHERN DOUGLAS COUNTIES... At 804 PM CST, moderate to heavy snow showers were along a line extending from near Thomas Lake Near Brimson, to Boulder Lake, to near Meadowlands, and moving southeast at 35 mph. Visibilities of 1/2 mile or less, wind gusts up to 35 mph, and rapid snow accumulation on roads are expected with these moderate to heavy snow showers. Locations impacted include... Duluth, Superior, Cloquet, Hermantown, Two Harbors, Proctor, Lake Nebagamon, Scanlon, Carlton, Maple, Poplar, Oulu, Cotton, Oliver, Wrenshall, Port Wing, Thomson, Wolf Lake, Herbster, and Wisconsin Point. Be prepared for changing visibility and road conditions. Reduce your speed and allow more space between you and the vehicle in front of you.
